name: .MADESKTOP
summary: Learn about .MADESKTOP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: MADESKTOP files are not meant to be opened or edited manually. Instead, macOS automatically creates and references MADESKTOP files.

Since MADESKTOP files are plain-text property lists, advanced users can view their contents with a text editor, but macOS may not recognize manual changes until the operating system reloads the desktop settings.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .madesktop file in Apple TextEdit 1.2
images.caption: MADESKTOP file open in Apple TextEdit 1.2
